Runtime API Examples JP ​

This page demonstrates usage of some of the runtime APIs provided by VitePress.

The main useData() API can be used to access site, theme, and page data for the current page. It works in both .md and .vue files:

md
<script setup>
import { useData } from 'vitepress'

const { theme, page, frontmatter } = useData()
</script>

## Results

### Theme Data
<pre>{{ theme }}</pre>

### Page Data
<pre>{{ page }}</pre>

### Page Frontmatter
<pre>{{ frontmatter }}</pre>

Results ​

{
  "logo": {
    "light": "/FLSv2.svg",
    "dark": "/FLS_dark.svg",
    "alt": "FLS Logo"
  },
  "nav": [
    {
      "text": "Examples JP",
      "link": "/examples"
    },
    {
      "text": "Examples JP",
      "link": "/examples"
    }
  ],

    "message": "Released under the <a href=\"\">MIT License</a>.",
    "copyright": "Made with VitePress and ❤️ in Sapporo. Copyright ©2024 <a href=\"\">FabLab Sapporo</a>"
  }
}
